title: Implement Send page > Edit Receiver networks

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet Send Page MVP
labels.description: all issues for the send page of the wallet

body: # Feature Issue ### User Story As a user, I want to edit which networks the receiver will receive the assets on **so that** I can optimize transaction efficiency and align with their preferred blockchain networks, while maintaining the flexibility to accommodate non-preferred networks if needed. ### Description Figma Design 1: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503644&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Figma Design 2: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503675&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Figma Design 3: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503714&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Figma Design 4: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503755&mode=design&t=HUmtev01QbEue8sV-4 Visual reference: ### Acceptance Criteria - [ ] When user taps on plus button in the receiver column, `Edit receiver networks` bottom sheet should be shown - [ ] Should show receiver preferred and non-preferred networks (Mainnet, Optimism, Arbitrum) - [ ] If user checks a non-preferred network, an alert should be shown to the user ([Figma reference](https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2388-503750&mode=design&t=V0dXiJUCqM0Jo7Od-4)) - [ ] Fees should be re-calculated when receiver networks are edited and user taps on `Apply changes` button Feel free to break up this issue in smaller issues if necessary
